"Create a shopping cart that uses AI to suggest items based on a customer's past purchases and browsing history."
"Design a shopping cart that uses augmented reality to show customers how furniture or other items will look in their home before they make a purchase."
"Develop a shopping cart that allows customers to create and save custom product bundles, complete with pricing and delivery information."
"Integrate a social media component into the shopping cart, allowing customers to share their favorite products with friends and family and earn rewards for referrals."
"Create a shopping cart that uses machine learning to predict customer needs and offer personalized recommendations for products that may be relevant but have not yet been viewed."
